ItemTooltips.tpscroll: Core on every hero. Do not get caught without a TP Scroll.
ItemTooltips.ultimate_scepter: Makes your ultiamate a whole lot better.
ItemTooltips.mask_of_madness: Using this before Omnislash increases the number of strikes inbetween Omnislash strikes. In most cases skip this item.
ItemTooltips.soul_ring: Works really well with healing ward, especially considering your low mana pool.
ItemTooltips.orb_of_venom: Good for slowing down enemies. Skip if it doesnt fit your playstyle.

AbilityTooltips.juggernaut_blade_fury: A great skill. Does AoE damage. If your lane partner has a slow feel free to attempt a first blood with this skill.
AbilityTooltips.juggernaut_healing_ward: A great pushing skill. Provides a huge amount of regeneration. Use it to stay longer in lane and to push down towers. Once cast keep it away from enemies as it dies in 1 hit.
AbilityTooltips.juggernaut_omni_slash: Early game you can finish off enemies caught without a creep wave. Later on use it in teamfights to dish out as much damage as possible.
